sentences.sContent: And if you are a very lucky man, you may have the chance to meet your white lotus flower, then change her into a red rose, at last, and let her be a carnation.
sentences.sContent_eng: And if you are a very lucky man, you may have the chance to meet your white lotus flower, then change her into a red rose, at last, and let her be a carnation.
sentences.sCn: 但是，如果你是个足够幸运的男人，你有机会遇到你梦中的白莲，然后让她变成红玫瑰，最后再演变成一朵康乃馨。

trans.tranCn: [园艺] 康乃馨；肉色；粉红色
trans.tranOther: a flower that smells sweet. Men often wear a carnation on their jacket on formal occasions.
